title: Pool Training
subtitle: Regular freediving training sessions at Kodeljevo pool.
subtitle2: Build strength, technique, and breath-hold capacity.
introText: Our regular pool training sessions at Kodeljevo pool in Ljubljana offer the perfect environment to develop and maintain your freediving skills year-round. With up to 4 sessions per week, you can build psychophysical strength, increase COâ‚‚ tolerance, improve general conditioning, and perfect your swimming, breathing, and relaxation techniques.
featuresDescription1: Perfect your horizontal underwater swimming technique with fins, focusing on efficiency, streamlining, and distance.
featuresDescription2: Challenge yourself with no-fins training, building raw power and perfecting your dolphin kick and breaststroke technique.
featuresDescription3: Develop your breath-hold capacity and mental focus with dedicated static apnea sessions in a controlled environment.
featuresDescription4: Learn and practice proper breathing patterns for freediving, including relaxation breathing and recovery techniques.
featuresDescription5: Build your tolerance to carbon dioxide through specific training tables, preparing your body and mind for longer breath-holds.
featuresDescription6: Master the art of underwater relaxation, learning to calm your mind and body for more efficient and enjoyable dives.
scheduleNote: Join any session that fits your schedule. No need to commit to specific days.
pricingNote: ðŸ’¡ Monthly pass offers the best value for regular training.
includes3: Access to up to 4 sessions per week
